name: Black Rocket Labs
overview:
BlackRocket Labs is an interactive atelier created by designer Greg Roberts.

The Company works with a select clientele to create fun, engaging, and educational experiences that elegantly bridge the digital and physical worlds. Their focus is natural computing, aka NUI: developing multi-sensory interfaces that deeply engage audiences, both physically and emotionally. The BlackRocket team has created permanent installations in some of the largest theme parks, ultra clubs, science centers, public venues and art exhibitions in the world.
